 4.ä¿®æ¹mqtt.js

import mqtt from 'mqtt/dist/mqtt.min'
import store from '@/store/index.js'
// MQTT éç½®ï¼æ ¹æ®å®éæå¡ç«¯ä¿®æ¹ï¼
const MQTT_CONFIG = {
    // ä¸åç«¯çè¿æ¥åè®®ï¼
    // H5: ws://xxx:8083/mqtt æ wss://xxx:8084/mqtt
    // å¾®ä¿¡å°ç¨åº: wxs://xxx:8084/mqttï¼ééç½®ååç½ååï¼
    // App: tcp://xxx:1883ï¼ééç½®ç½ç»æéï¼
    host: 'wxs://xxx:8084/mqtt', 
    // host: 'ws://xxx:8083/mqtt', 
    clientId: `wine-${Math.random().toString(16).substr(2, 8)}`, // å¯ä¸å®¢æ·ç«¯ID
    username: 'zyw', // æå¡ç«¯è®¤è¯ç¨æ·åï¼æ åçç©ºï¼
    password: 'zyw123456', // æå¡ç«¯è®¤è¯å¯ç ï¼æ åçç©ºï¼
    keepalive: 60, // å¿è·³é´éï¼ç§ï¼
    reconnectPeriod: 5000, // éè¿é´éï¼æ¯«ç§ï¼
    clean: true // æ¸é¤ä¼è¯ï¼trueï¼æ­å¼åä¸ä¿çè®¢éï¼
}

// å¨å± MQTT å®¢æ·ç«¯å®ä¾
let client = null
// æ¶æ¯åè°å½æ°ï¼ä¾é¡µé¢çå¬ï¼
let messageCallback = null

/**
 * è¿æ¥ MQTT æå¡å¨
 * @param {Function} callback æ¶æ¯æ¥æ¶åè° (topic, message) => {}
 */
export function connectMQTT(callback) {
    // ä¿å­æ¶æ¯åè°
    messageCallback = callback

    // å·²è¿æ¥åç´æ¥è¿å
    if (client && client.connected){
        store.commit('chang_xcx_zt', 1)//å¨çº¿
        return false;
    } 

    // åå»ºè¿æ¥
    client = mqtt.connect(MQTT_CONFIG.host, {
        clientId: MQTT_CONFIG.clientId,
        username: MQTT_CONFIG.username,
        password: MQTT_CONFIG.password,
        keepalive: MQTT_CONFIG.keepalive,
        reconnectPeriod: MQTT_CONFIG.reconnectPeriod,
        clean: MQTT_CONFIG.clean
    })

    // è¿æ¥æååè°
    client.on('connect', () => {
        console.log('MQTT è¿æ¥æåï¼', MQTT_CONFIG.clientId);
        if(MQTT_CONFIG.clientId){
            store.commit('chang_xcx_zt', 1)//å¨çº¿
            if (messageCallback) {
                var p_obj={};
                var p_data={};
                
                p_data.keyword="connect";
                p_data.clientId=MQTT_CONFIG.clientId;
                p_data.msg="MQTT è¿æ¥æå";
                
                p_obj.code=1;
                p_obj.data=p_data;
                messageCallback(p_obj) // è½¬å­ç¬¦ä¸²ä¾¿äºå¤ç
            }
        }
    })

    // æ¥æ¶æ¶æ¯åè°
    client.on('message', (topic, message) => {
        console.log(`æ¶å°æ¶æ¯1ï¼topic=${topic}, message=${message.toString()}`)
        if (messageCallback) {
            messageCallback(topic, message.toString()) // è½¬å­ç¬¦ä¸²ä¾¿äºå¤ç
        }
    })

    // è¿æ¥éè¯¯åè°
    client.on('error', (error) => {
        console.error('MQTT è¿æ¥éè¯¯ï¼', error)
        store.commit('chang_xcx_zt', 0)//ç¦»çº¿
        if (messageCallback) {
            var p_obj={};
            var p_data={};
            p_data.keyword="error";
            p_data.error=error;
            p_data.msg="MQTT è¿æ¥éè¯¯";
            
            p_obj.code=1;
            p_obj.data=p_data;
            messageCallback(p_obj) // è½¬å­ç¬¦ä¸²ä¾¿äºå¤ç
        }
        
    })

    // æ­å¼è¿æ¥åè°
    client.on('close', () => {
        console.log('MQTT è¿æ¥æ­å¼');
        store.commit('chang_xcx_zt', 0)//ç¦»çº¿

        if (messageCallback) {
            var p_obj={};
            var p_data={};
            p_data.keyword="close";
            p_data.msg="MQTT è¿æ¥æ­å¼";
            
            p_obj.code=1;
            p_obj.data=p_data;
            messageCallback(p_obj) // è½¬å­ç¬¦ä¸²ä¾¿äºå¤ç
        }
    })

    // éè¿åè°
    client.on('reconnect', () => {
        console.log('MQTT æ­£å¨éè¿...')
        store.commit('chang_xcx_zt', 0)//ç¦»çº¿
        if (messageCallback) {
            var p_obj={};
            var p_data={};
            p_data.keyword="reconnect";
            p_data.msg="MQTT æ­£å¨éè¿";
            
            p_obj.code=1;
            p_obj.data=p_data;
            messageCallback(p_obj) // è½¬å­ç¬¦ä¸²ä¾¿äºå¤ç
        }
    })
}
/**
 * æ­å¼ MQTT è¿æ¥
 */
export function disconnectMQTT(callback) {
    if (client && client.connected) {
        // ä¿å­æ¶æ¯åè°
        messageCallback = callback
        client.end()
        client = null
        console.log('MQTT ä¸»å¨æ­å¼è¿æ¥')
        store.commit('chang_xcx_zt', 0)//ç¦»çº¿
        if (messageCallback) {
            var p_obj={};
            var p_data={};
            p_data.keyword="disconnect";
            p_data.msg="MQTT ä¸»å¨æ­å¼è¿æ¥";
            
            p_obj.code=1;
            p_obj.data=p_data;
            messageCallback(p_obj) // è½¬å­ç¬¦ä¸²ä¾¿äºå¤ç
        }
        
    }
}

/**
 * è®¢é MQTT ä¸»é¢
 * @param {String|Array} topic ä¸»é¢ï¼åä¸ªå­ç¬¦ä¸²ææ°ç»ï¼
 * @param {Number} qos æå¡è´¨éï¼0/1/2ï¼é»è®¤0ï¼
 */
export function subscribeMQTT(topic, qos = 0) {
  if (!client || !client.connected) {
    console.error('MQTT æªè¿æ¥ï¼æ æ³è®¢é')
    return
  }
  client.subscribe(topic, { qos }, (error) => {
    if (error) {
      console.error(`è®¢éä¸»é¢ ${topic} å¤±è´¥ï¼`, error)
    } else {
      console.log(`è®¢éä¸»é¢ ${topic} æå`)
    }
  })
}

/**
 * åå¸ MQTT æ¶æ¯
 * @param {String} topic ä¸»é¢
 * @param {String|Object} message æ¶æ¯åå®¹ï¼å¯¹è±¡ä¼è½¬ä¸ºJSONå­ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼
 * @param {Number} qos æå¡è´¨éï¼0/1/2ï¼é»è®¤0ï¼
 */
export function publishMQTT(topic, message, qos = 0) {
  if (!client || !client.connected) {
    console.error('MQTT æªè¿æ¥ï¼æ æ³åå¸æ¶æ¯')
    return
  }
  // ç»ä¸è½¬ä¸ºå­ç¬¦ä¸²
  const msg = typeof message === 'object' ? JSON.stringify(message) : message
  client.publish(topic, msg, { qos }, (error) => {
    if (error) {
      console.error(`åå¸æ¶æ¯å° ${topic} å¤±è´¥ï¼`, error)
    } else {
      console.log(`åå¸æ¶æ¯å° ${topic} æåï¼`, msg)
    }
  })
}

/**
 * åæ¶è®¢é MQTT ä¸»é¢
 * @param {String|Array} topic ä¸»é¢ï¼åä¸ªå­ç¬¦ä¸²ææ°ç»ï¼
 */
export function unsubscribeMQTT(topic) {
  if (!client || !client.connected) {
    console.error('MQTT æªè¿æ¥ï¼æ æ³åæ¶è®¢é')
    return
  }
  client.unsubscribe(topic, (error) => {
    if (error) {
      console.error(`åæ¶è®¢é ${topic} å¤±è´¥ï¼`, error)
    } else {
      console.log(`åæ¶è®¢é ${topic} æå`)
    }
  })
}

<script>
    import { connectMQTT, subscribeMQTT, publishMQTT, disconnectMQTT } from '@/common/mqtt.js'
    export default {

        onLaunch: function() {

        onShow: function() {

            var xcx_zt = this.$store.state.xcx_zt; 
            //console.log("cccc",xcx_zt)

                this.initMqtt()
            }
        },
        onHide: function() {
            //console.log('App Hide');
            // åºç¨ååå°ï¼å¯éæ­å¼è¿æ¥ï¼æ ¹æ®ä¸å¡éæ±ï¼
            this.disMqtt();
        },
        
        methods:{
            // è¿æ¥MQTT
            initMqtt() {
                console.log("eee")
                var _this=this;
                connectMQTT((res) => {
                    
                    console.log("ffff")
                    if(res.code==1){
                        //åå»ºæ¥å¿
                        this.add_log(res.data).then((resolve, reject) => {
                        })
                    }
                })
            },
            // æ­å¼è¿æ¥MQTT
            disMqtt() {
                console.log("dddd")
                var _this=this;
                disconnectMQTT((res) => {
                    if(res.code==1){
                        //åå»ºæ¥å¿
                        this.add_log(res.data).then((resolve, reject) => {
                        })
                    }
                });                
            },
            //è¿æ¥æ¥å¿
            async add_log(params){
                var _this=this;
                
                return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
                    let p_obj={};
                    p_obj.code=0;
                    p_obj.msg="æä½å¤±è´¥";
                    
                    let user_info = uni.getStorageSync('user_info');
                    let post_obj={};
                    post_obj.user_id=user_info.id;
                    //å°ç¨åº
                    // #ifdef MP-WEIXIN
                    let openid=uni.getStorageSync('openid');
                    post_obj.openid=openid;
                    // #endif
                    post_obj.keyword=params.keyword;
                    post_obj.params=params;
                    
                    uni.$u.api.mqtt_log(post_obj).then(res => {
                        if(res.code==1){
                            p_obj.code=1;
                            p_obj.msg=res.msg;
                            resolve(p_obj);
                            return false;
                            
                        }else{
                            p_obj.code=0;
                            p_obj.msg=res.msg;
                            resolve(p_obj);
                            return false;
                        }
                    })
                })
                
            },
        
        }
    }
</script>

public void emitRecord(ByteBuffer record, int targetSubpartition) throws IOException {
    totalWrittenBytes += record.remaining();

    BufferBuilder buffer = appendUnicastDataForNewRecord(record, targetSubpartition);

    while (record.hasRemaining()) {
        // full buffer, partial record
        finishUnicastBufferBuilder(targetSubpartition);
        buffer = appendUnicastDataForRecordContinuation(record, targetSubpartition);
    }

    if (buffer.isFull()) {
        // full buffer, full record
        finishUnicastBufferBuilder(targetSubpartition);
    }

    // partial buffer, full record
}

private MemorySegment requestMemorySegment(int targetChannel) {
    MemorySegment segment = null;
    synchronized (availableMemorySegments) {
        checkDestroyed();

        if (!availableMemorySegments.isEmpty()) {
            segment = availableMemorySegments.poll();
        } else if (isRequestedSizeReached()) {
            // Only when the buffer request reaches the upper limit(i.e. current pool size),
            // requests an overdraft buffer.
            segment = requestOverdraftMemorySegmentFromGlobal();
        }

        if (segment == null) {
            return null;
        }

        if (targetChannel != UNKNOWN_CHANNEL) {
            if (++subpartitionBuffersCount[targetChannel] == maxBuffersPerChannel) {
                unavailableSubpartitionsCount++;
            }
        }

        checkAndUpdateAvailability();
    }
    return segment;
}

public DataInputStatus emitNext(DataOutput<T> output) throws Exception {

    while (true) {
        // get the stream element from the deserializer
        if (currentRecordDeserializer != null) {
            RecordDeserializer.DeserializationResult result;
            try {
                result = currentRecordDeserializer.getNextRecord(deserializationDelegate);
            } catch (IOException e) {
                throw new IOException(
                        String.format("Can't get next record for channel %s", lastChannel), e);
            }
            if (result.isBufferConsumed()) {
                currentRecordDeserializer = null;
            }

            if (result.isFullRecord()) {
                final boolean breakBatchEmitting =
                        processElement(deserializationDelegate.getInstance(), output);
                if (canEmitBatchOfRecords.check() && !breakBatchEmitting) {
                    continue;
                }
                return DataInputStatus.MORE_AVAILABLE;
            }
        }

        Optional<BufferOrEvent> bufferOrEvent = checkpointedInputGate.pollNext();
        if (bufferOrEvent.isPresent()) {
            // return to the mailbox after receiving a checkpoint barrier to avoid processing of
            // data after the barrier before checkpoint is performed for unaligned checkpoint
            // mode
            if (bufferOrEvent.get().isBuffer()) {
                processBuffer(bufferOrEvent.get());
            } else {
                DataInputStatus status = processEvent(bufferOrEvent.get(), output);
                if (status == DataInputStatus.MORE_AVAILABLE && canEmitBatchOfRecords.check()) {
                    continue;
                }
                return status;
            }
        } else {
            if (checkpointedInputGate.isFinished()) {
                checkState(
                        checkpointedInputGate.getAvailableFuture().isDone(),
                        "Finished BarrierHandler should be available");
                return DataInputStatus.END_OF_INPUT;
            }
            return DataInputStatus.NOTHING_AVAILABLE;
        }
    }
}

è¿éæ¯è°ç¨ checkpointedInputGate.pollNext æ¥è·åè¾å¥çæ°æ®ãå®çåé¨å°±æ¯è°ç¨ InputGate ç pollNext æ¹æ³æ¥è·åæ°æ®ãå½è·åå°å®æ´æ°æ®ä¹åï¼å°±ä¼è°ç¨ processElement æ¥å¤çæ°æ®ã

public Optional<BufferAndAvailability> getNextBuffer() throws IOException {
    checkError();

    if (!toBeConsumedBuffers.isEmpty()) {
        return getBufferAndAvailability(toBeConsumedBuffers.removeFirst());
    }

    ResultSubpartitionView subpartitionView = this.subpartitionView;
    if (subpartitionView == null) {
        // There is a possible race condition between writing a EndOfPartitionEvent (1) and
        // flushing (3) the Local
        // channel on the sender side, and reading EndOfPartitionEvent (2) and processing flush
        // notification (4). When
        // they happen in that order (1 - 2 - 3 - 4), flush notification can re-enqueue
        // LocalInputChannel after (or
        // during) it was released during reading the EndOfPartitionEvent (2).
        if (isReleased) {
            return Optional.empty();
        }

        // this can happen if the request for the partition was triggered asynchronously
        // by the time trigger
        // would be good to avoid that, by guaranteeing that the requestPartition() and
        // getNextBuffer() always come from the same thread
        // we could do that by letting the timer insert a special "requesting channel" into the
        // input gate's queue
        subpartitionView = checkAndWaitForSubpartitionView();
    }

    BufferAndBacklog next = subpartitionView.getNextBuffer();
    // ignore the empty buffer directly
    while (next != null && next.buffer().readableBytes() == 0) {
        next.buffer().recycleBuffer();
        next = subpartitionView.getNextBuffer();
        numBuffersIn.inc();
    }

    if (next == null) {
        if (subpartitionView.isReleased()) {
            throw new CancelTaskException(
                    "Consumed partition " + subpartitionView + " has been released.");
        } else {
            return Optional.empty();
        }
    }

    Buffer buffer = next.buffer();

    if (buffer instanceof FullyFilledBuffer) {
        List<Buffer> partialBuffers = ((FullyFilledBuffer) buffer).getPartialBuffers();
        int seq = next.getSequenceNumber();
        for (Buffer partialBuffer : partialBuffers) {
            toBeConsumedBuffers.add(
                    new BufferAndBacklog(
                            partialBuffer,
                            next.buffersInBacklog(),
                            buffer.getDataType(),
                            seq++));
        }

        return getBufferAndAvailability(toBeConsumedBuffers.removeFirst());
    }

    return getBufferAndAvailability(next);
}

void Delay(unsigned int xms)
{
	unsigned char i, j;
	while(xms--)
	{
		i = 2;
		j = 239;
		do
		{
			while (--j);
		} while (--i);
	}
}

/**

/**
  * @brief  è¿åå¼=XçYæ¬¡æ¹

int LCD_Pow(int X,int Y)

/**
  * @brief  å¨LCD1602æå®ä½ç½®å¼å§æ¾ç¤ºæç»æ°å­
  * @param  Line èµ·å§è¡ä½ç½®ï¼èå´ï¼1~2
  * @param  Column èµ·å§åä½ç½®ï¼èå´ï¼1~16
  * @param  Number è¦æ¾ç¤ºçæ°å­ï¼èå´ï¼0~65535
  * @param  Length è¦æ¾ç¤ºæ°å­çé¿åº¦ï¼èå´ï¼1~5
  * @retval æ

void LCD_ShowNum(unsigned char Line,unsigned char Column,unsigned int Number,unsigned char Length)
{
	unsigned char i;

/**

  * @param  Line èµ·å§è¡ä½ç½®ï¼èå´ï¼1~2
  * @param  Column èµ·å§åä½ç½®ï¼èå´ï¼1~16
  * @param  Number è¦æ¾ç¤ºçæ°å­ï¼èå´ï¼-32768~32767
  * @param  Length è¦æ¾ç¤ºæ°å­çé¿åº¦ï¼èå´ï¼1~5

void LCD_ShowSignedNum(unsigned char Line,unsigned char Column,int Number,unsigned char Length)
{
	unsigned char i;
	unsigned int Number1;

	if(Number>=0)

/**

  * @param  Line èµ·å§è¡ä½ç½®ï¼èå´ï¼1~2

  * @param  Length è¦æ¾ç¤ºæ°å­çé¿åº¦ï¼èå´ï¼1~4
  * @retval æ

void LCD_ShowHexNum(unsigned char Line,unsigned char Column,unsigned int Number,unsigned char Length)
{
	unsigned char i,SingleNumber;
	LCD_SetCursor(Line,Column);

  * @param  Length è¦æ¾ç¤ºæ°å­çé¿åº¦ï¼èå´ï¼1~16
